# wholeSymbol

**Instance Property**

An effect that replaces all layers simultaneously.

## Declaration

```swift
var wholeSymbol: ReplaceSymbolEffect { get }
```

## Determining effect scope

- **byLayer**: An effect that replaces each layer separately.
